menu.title: Pancakes
menu.desc: The taste of milk in buttermilk pancakes! Add flavor to your day with our soft textured pancakes.

menu.title: Double Hamburger
menu.desc: Our double burger, prepared in diner style, is the perfect choice for your lunch with its delicious taste and satisfying texture!

menu.title: Godzilla Milkshake
menu.desc: A legendary taste awaits you! Pamper yourself with our Godzilla Milkshake and take a sweet break.

menu.title: Breakfast
menu.desc: The indispensable taste of village breakfasts is now here! Village Taste breakfast, prepared with completely natural ingredients, invites you to a delicious feast of taste.

menu.title: Egg Attack
menu.desc: Our delicious hamburger with 120 grams of meat, cooked over a wood fire, is waiting for you. Fire is calling you!

menu.title: Oreo Dream
menu.desc: A wonderful flavor for Oreo lovers! Oreo Dream takes you to a sweet world. You can't get enough of its taste!

menu.title: Bacon Power
menu.desc: A must for breakfast for bacon lovers! Bacon Seli, prepared with plenty of freshly fried bacon and other delicacies, will give you a great start to the day.

menu.title: Classic American Flavor
menu.desc: This lunch, prepared with the classic flavors of American cuisine, offers an unforgettable experience. Moreover, it is preferred due to its affordable price!

menu.title: Quarantine Friend
menu.desc: A delicious milkshake that will not leave you alone when you are bored during quarantine days! Have a sweet getaway with Quarantine Buddy.

menu.title: Bison Steak
menu.desc: The unique flavor of bison meat is combined with special spices and sauces. Bison Steak is the perfect choice for your dinner!
